name: Bloop
description: Bloop is a playful pokemon that whizzes through the water, making it look like a small tornado. Its strange Aquablast and Smack abilities are used to both defend and attack, often leaving other pokemon in awe. It loves to flit around coral and wreak bubbly havoc on unsuspecting fish, always looking for a good time.
image_prompt: Bloop::0 a chibi young water-type bubble pokemon, in a ocean environment, gleaming bubble background, anime chibi drawing style, pastel background --niji --ar 3:2
